description: v0.5.5 — sixth AI review: org-shape validator, X-on-Y clamping, directory vendor patterns. (1) Security/audit vendor patterns for Drishti-like cases. (2) Tightened builder_tech (removed API/SDK). (3) Primary affiliation logic — message self-declare beats display_name. (4) Removed community role boost from mention_count. (5) Kept founder_exec 0-msg tentative.
